Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI.FXMLControllers

Class FXMLChooseFirstPlayerController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI.FXMLControllers.FXMLChooseFirstPlayerController
public class FXMLChooseFirstPlayerController
extends java.lang.Object
controller to manage the scene of the Challenger to select the first player of the match

    • setController

      public void setController​(java.lang.String nicknameChallenger, ClientView clientView, java.util.List<java.lang.String> playersNicknames, java.util.List<java.lang.String> cardsName, java.util.List<java.lang.String> effectsList)
      set the controller to manage events
      Parameters:
      nicknameChallenger - name of the challenger that see the scene
      clientView - clientView to send answers
      playersNicknames - list of nickname to choose the first that starts his turn
      cardsName - name of the card selected by each player
      effectsList - description of each card
